entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:28 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 01:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -10.9°C
Wind: SW 30 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
